title: Mobile Suit Crossbone Gundam X-11
alternative_title: Kidou Senshi Crossbone Gundam X-11 ; 機動戦士クロスボーン・ガンダムX-11
status: Kidou Senshi Crossbone Gundam X-11 ; 機動戦士クロスボーン・ガンダムX-11
description:
Description :
        The story is set in U.C. 0170, during the events of Mobile Suit Crossbone Gundam: Dust. The story follows Curtis Rothko, and is once again set in the Jupiter Sphere.
